players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Bob is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is"
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, who did you investigate and what did you find?"
Charlie: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, you need to share who you investigated and what you found immediately."
You: "Bob, if you're the real detective, you should have investigated someone last night. Who was it and what did you learn?"
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the real detective, you must reveal your investigation target and result now. Your silence is suspicious."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found out she is the mafioso. I'm sure of it now."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is"
Alice: "Bob, if you're the detective, who did you investigate and what did you find?"
Charlie: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, you need to share who you investigated and what you found immediately."
Alice: "Bob, if you're the real detective, you should have investigated someone last night. Who was it and what did you learn?"
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the real detective, you must reveal your investigation target and result now. Your silence is suspicious."
You: "I investigated Alice and found out she is the mafioso. I'm sure of it now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
